Artillery [i](This creature gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.)[/i]
Whenever Bamdo the Professional or another creature you control attacks alone, look at the top four cards of your library. You may put an Equipment card with converted mana cost 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield attached to that creature. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: [i]“Don't you know it's dangerous to go alone? Here. Take this.”[/i]
